title: Drawing, "Textile Design:  Wundervogel [Miraculous Bird]", designed 1911–19
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink on mount below 195 • 196: Dessin: "Woudervogel"; Inscribed in blue crayon upper left corner of mount (sideways): 40
creditline: Museum purchase from Smithsonian Collections Acquisition and Decorative Arts Association Acquisition Funds
description: A twentieth century version of a Renaissance grotesque form with stylized heraldic parrots below and frame work of arched branches on lime green background with blue flowers.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Textile Design:  Wundervogel [Miraculous Bird]", designed 1911–19.
designed 1911–19. Brush and gouache, graphite on paper. Museum purchase from Smithsonian Collections Acquisition and Decorative Arts Association Acquisition Funds. 1988-62-193.
